name: Cipher Monk
description:
Welcome to Cipher Monk!

Tease your brain in this number logic game where you have to use an old numeric system do decipher the answers!
Drag, rotate and drop the pieces to get the correct number!

Key features

Handcrafted Levels
The game comes with handcrafted levels that will tease your brain.

Simple controls
The game is played simply by dragging, rotating and droping the pieces.

Relaxing music
Originally composed music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles.
